title: When will the NA servers be back up {8/10/16}
body: I've been waiting for like 2 or 3 hours now haha. Does anyone have any clue on when the NA server will be back up?

replies.body: The login service issue that was going on has been resolved and you should be able to log in successfully now. Let me know if that's not the case, thanks!
Sitting here wondering the same thing, my only day off and I can't play. Seems to happen EVERY time I have a day off -.- .
